entry.title: Yuga Vows ‘Slow and Thoughtful’ Approach to Reviving CryptoPunks Arrival of Christie's Noah Davis Marks New Phase for OG NFT Collection
entry.summary: Arrival of Christie's Noah Davis Marks New Phase for OG NFT Collection

entry.title: Uniswap Tops Ethereum in Terms of Daily Fees
entry.summary: With $4.3M in fees generated in the past 24 hours, Uniswap has surpassed its home network, Ethereum, as of June 20.

entry.title: MakerDAO Token Holders Vote to Add Rocket Pool’s rETH as Collateral to Back DAI The next and final step is a so-called “executive vote.”
entry.summary: MakerDAO, the largest DeFi lender by total value locked, could soon allow another Ether derivative as collateral on its network.

entry.title: Lido Proposes ‘Dual-Governance’ Scheme to Quell Ethereum Centralization Fears
entry.summary: If successful, it would prevent validators from amassing undue power, and give stETH holders veto powers over proposed changes to the protocol.

entry.title: Inbox Dump
entry.summary: Welcome to Inbox Dump where we include the updates and announcements that flood our DMs each week and didn’t make it to The Defiant’s content platforms. Sometimes announcements here didn’t meet the bar to become a news story, sometimes they may have slipped through the cracks, or they came late and we haven’t had a chance to cover.
